title: Exploring the Deep Mystery of Life's Origins

media:group.media:title: Exploring the Deep Mystery of Life's Origins
media:group.media:description:
As an evolutionary biochemist at University College London, Nick Lane explores the deep mystery of how life evolved on Earth. His hypothesis that life arose through primitive metabolic reactions in deep-sea hydrothermal vents illuminates the outsized role that energy may have played in shaping evolution. 

Read more at Quanta: https://www.quantamagazine.org/a-biochemists-view-of-lifes-origin-reframes-cancer-and-aging-20500804/

Quanta Magazine is an editorially independent publication supported by the Simons Foundation.
